entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 03:29 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
